  • Method Details

    • init

      public void init(StartViewModel startViewModel, ViewHandler viewHandler)
      Init method. Sets the start view model instance and the view handler instance. Also initializes the top panel and bottom panel, and all the bindings of the fxml elements with the start view model. Fills and sorts the highscore table by score.
      Parameters:
      startViewModel - start view model instance
      viewHandler - view handler instance

    • handleRefreshButtonClicked

      private void handleRefreshButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is called when the refresh button is clicked. It gets the newest highscore data, fills the table and sorts it by score.
      Parameters:
      event - action event

    • handleJoinCreateTeamButtonClicked

      private void handleJoinCreateTeamButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is called when the create/join team button is clicked. It redirects to the team view.
      Parameters:
      event - action event

    • handleStartButtonClicked

      private void handleStartButtonClicked(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is called, when the start button is clicked. It resets the game timer and redirects to the waiting view.
      Parameters:
      event - action event
